game.title: Dragon's Lair
game.objective: Purge the dragon from its lair
game.description: Long ago, a terrifying dragon took residence in the nearby mountain lair, causing fear and destruction among the villagers. Your task is to venture into the dragon's lair, face the fiery beast, and rid it from our lands once and for all.

task.description: Use the map given by the elder to locate the dragon's lair
Utilize your skills and tools available to defeat the dragon
